biography: Anwesha is a Master of Laws by education and a technologist by passion.She is a fellow at the Python Software Foundation and the Release Manager of Ansible. She works as a Software Engineer with the Ansible Engineering team at Red Hat. She led PyLadies efforts in India and now is an organizer at PyLadies Stockholm.  You can follow her blog at https://anweshadas.in.
name: Anwesha Das
